tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE quality_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  supplier_id INT,
  report_date DATE,
  report_details TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES suppliers(supplier_id)
);

CREATE TABLE quality_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    inspector_name VARCHAR(255),
    violation_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE inspection_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT,
    inspection_date DATE,
    inspection_result VARCHAR(50),
    remarks TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE suppliers (  supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,  supplier_name VARCHAR(255),  supplier_location VARCHAR(255) );
CREATE TABLE quality_performance (  performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,  supplier_id INT,  performance_rating INT,  performance_date DATE,  FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES suppliers(supplier_id) );
CREATE TABLE issues (  issue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,  performance_id INT,  issue_description TEXT,  FOREIGN KEY (performance_id) REFERENCES quality_performance(performance_id) );
CREATE TABLE audits (  audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,  issue_id INT,  audit_date DATE,  audit_result VARCHAR(50),  FOREIGN KEY (issue_id) REFERENCES issues(issue_id) );

CREATE TABLE supplier_quality_performance (
    supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(50),
    quality_rating INT,
    contact_person VARCHAR(50),
    contact_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE product_quality_metrics (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(50),
    defect_count INT,
    defect_type VARCHAR(50),
    inspection_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE inspection_history (
    inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    inspection_date DATE,
    inspector_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE supplier_contacts (
    supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contact_person VARCHAR(50),
    email_address VARCHAR(50),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    department VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE quality_standards (
    standard_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    standard_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    category VARCHAR(50),
    created_date DATE
);
